amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for NOAA fleet modernization unless those funds are used to contract with the private sector.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 25, as amendment No. 51, to prohibit use of funds for NOAA fleet modernization, unless those funds are used to contract with the private sector.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
